DESCRIPTION: Your Attacks deal #b50% more damage and you take #b50% more damage from attacks. Upon exiting this #yStance, gain #b3 #yVigor.
In this #yStance, #yBlock is not removed at the start of your turn. Upon exiting this #yStance [REMOVE_SPACE], double your #yBlock [REMOVE_SPACE]. Exit this #yStance at the start of your next turn.
